Spell.Name: Bane
Spell.Description: Up to three creatures of your choice that you can see within range must make Charisma saving throws. Whenever a target that fails this saving throw makes an attack roll or a saving throw before the spell ends, the target must roll a d4 and subtract the number rolled from the attack roll or saving throw.

Description.Name: At Higher Levels
Description.Text: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 2nd level or higher, you can target one additional creature for each slot level above 1st.
